name: Fast RMX
summary: Jump into the driver’s seat of your anti-gravity vehicle and put your skills to the test in high octane competitions. Challenge your friends to local split-screen competition or take part in online races against players from around the world.
info:
• 中文名: 极速赛车RMX
  • 发行: アークシステムワークス
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 1-8人
  • 发行日期: 2017年3月3日
  • 售价: $19.99
  • 官方网站: http://fast.shinen.com/rmx/
